item.title: Atom - plugin
item.description: IDE configuration can save programmers a lot of time and effort, in this post I would like to share my personal configuration of Atom to developer angular2 apps. Plugin Description atom-typescript typescript styling & autocomplete linter-tslint linters for typescript markdown-preview-plus IDE preview of markdown files open-in-browsers opens HTML file in browsers from IDE todo-show lists TODO in the IDE auto-save Saves changes on blur
